Package ualberta.g12.adventurecreator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FController
    Controllers fragment modifications within the selected fragment.
    FView<M>  
    LView<M>  
    SController
    Controls data from the Story Model
    SView<M>
    A view that interacts the story model
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdventureCreatorApplication  
    BuildConfig  
    Choice
    Used to implement, set, and link desired choices to each other.
    CreateStoryActivity
    Activity when an author creates a new story.
    EditChoiceActivity
    Activity used for choice editing within the selected story.
    EditFragmentActivity
    Activity for editing a fragment.
    EditTextSegOnClickListener
    Listener for a fragment modification.
    FModel<V extends FView>  
    Fragment
    Saves and returns all the corresponding fragment information upon fragment saving or fragment recall.
    FragmentController
    Controller that dictates all fragment methods.
    FragmentListArrayAdapter  
    FragmentPartAdapter
    Adapter for communication between the fragment class and the segments within the fragment.
    LModel<V extends LView>
    Interface for models
    MainActivity
    Activity displayed for the start of the application.
    OfflineIOHelper
    Will Handle loading and saving of our offline(cached) stories from local storage
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    SerializableImage  
    SModel<V extends SView>  
    Story
    Models a story that would be created by an Author.
    StoryController
    Controller for the stories that deal with the information regarding stories in the application.
    StoryEditActivity
    View for editing a Story using a StoryController.
    This particular Activity should only be started via an intent from the main activity that has as an extra either the ID of the story to edit or NEW_STORY_ID
    StoryList
    Models the list of stories
    StoryListArrayAdapter
    Adapter that communicates between the list of stories and the text corresponding to display the story in the list.
    StoryListController
    controller that interacts with the listview of stories
